basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer and Project Manager with a track record of bridging technical execution and business strategy. Specialized in project recovery, team leadership, and scalable infrastructure design.

work.name: OR Lab Inc.
work.summary: Development of a unified booking management and smart lock control tool for accommodations.
highlights: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with AWS CDK: Automated environment provisioning and ensured reproducibility, reducing deployment time by 50%.
E2E Testing with Playwright: Introduced automated regression testing from scratch, significantly reducing manual QA costs and improving release confidence.
Tech Lead for a multi-national team (Japan, Philippines, Vietnam): Led code reviews, architectural decisions, and facilitated English communication across borders.

work.name: Rich Honeycomb Co.
work.summary: Development of a suite of tools for an MEO (Map Engine Optimization) service provider.
highlights: Developed multiple tools (sales list generator, competitor analysis, rank tracking) within a single month.
End-to-end Solo Development: Handled everything from requirements definition and tech stack selection (Next.js, Supabase) to implementation, deployment, and client training.
Leveraged Google Maps & Places APIs to achieve high-precision data collection at low cost.

work.name: Company S (Medical)
work.summary: New development and operation of a CRM (Patient Management System) and LINE Mini App for medical institutions.
highlights: PM & Dev Lead for a 20-person team (Engineers, Designers, QA).
Stakeholder Management: Aligned interests across Sales, CS, and Engineering departments, defining roadmaps and prioritization.
Quality Improvement: Spearheaded the introduction of Playwright for automated testing to address quality degradation, working closely with the QA team to increase test coverage.

work.name: Company S (Franchise)
work.summary: Development and maintenance of a core business system (Inventory, Estimation, Ordering, Construction Management) for a franchise headquarters and its franchisees.
highlights: Digital Transformation: Centralized fragmented workflows (Excel/Paper) into a unified system, improving operational efficiency by approximately 30%.
Major Upgrade: Executed a migration from Laravel 6 to 10, leading the refactoring of legacy code and reduction of technical debt.
Cloud Migration: Designed and implemented the migration from on-premise to AWS (ECS Fargate) and built a CI/CD pipeline (CodePipeline) to accelerate deployment frequency.
